name: Mental Toughness
description: Guardian Resilience and IDEAL-aligned cognitive drills.

cards.title: Guardian Breathing Ladder
cards.description: Practice 4-4-4-4 box breathing, 4-7-8 downshift, and tactical breathing before and after high stakes sims. Ref: Guardian Resilience Training.
cards.summaryText: Breathing ladders reset your nervous system in under a minute.

cards.title: Cognitive Reframing Drill
cards.description: Use the ABC (Activating event, Belief, Consequence) worksheet from the Guardian Resilience Framework to reframe stress stories. Ref: Guardian Resilience Framework.
cards.summaryText: Reframing keeps setbacks from spiraling into catastrophes.

cards.title: Imagery Rehearsal
cards.description: Spend 10 minutes visualizing flawless crew execution using all five senses before check-rides. Ref: USAF MRT curriculum.
cards.summaryText: Imagery primes the brain to treat success as familiar.

cards.title: Stress Inoculation Sets
cards.description: Pair moderate physical exertion with technical tasks to simulate ops stress (per Guardian Resilience Field Guide).
cards.summaryText: Train the brain to think clearly while the body is stressed.

cards.title: Battle Buddy Check
cards.description: Adopt the Guardian Wingman script (ASK, CARE, ESCORT) monthly to normalize mental health conversations. Ref: Guardian Resilience Program.
cards.summaryText: Wingman checks create early off-ramps from crisis.

cards.title: Micro-Recovery Toolkit
cards.description: Build a list of five-minute resets (walk, journal, breathwork) and post near consoles per Guardian Ideal guidance.

cards.title: Values-to-Action Alignment
cards.description: Review personal core values and list two weekly actions demonstrating alignment, as directed in the Guardian Ideal workbook.
cards.summaryText: Purpose fuels resilience when behaviors align with beliefs.

cards.title: Sleep Shield Protocol
cards.description: Execute the USAF Sleep Optimization checklist (caffeine cutoff, blue light reduction, pre-bed routine) nightly. Ref: USAF Sleep Guide.
cards.summaryText: Sleep discipline is mental armor for Guardians.

cards.title: Mindfulness Minute
cards.description: Integrate one-minute grounding breaks (5-4-3-2-1 senses) at top of every hour on console. Ref: Guardian Resilience Program.
cards.summaryText: Short mindfulness bursts maintain focus during 12-hour watches.

cards.title: After-Action Emotional Sweep
cards.description: Add an emotion check to every AAR (what did you feel, what do you need) to process stress in real time. Ref: Guardian Resilience Framework.
cards.summaryText: Feelings aired quickly rarely become morale problems.

cards.title: Peak/Recover Calendar
cards.description: Plot mission surge windows against personal life events to pre-plan support, using the Guardian Resilience Planner.
cards.summaryText: Proactive calendars reduce stress collisions at home and work.

cards.title: Gratitude Transmission
cards.description: Send a weekly gratitude note or voice memo to a teammate, reinforcing optimism bias rewiring. Ref: Guardian Ideal.
cards.summaryText: Gratitude protects morale and strengthens teams.
